name: Project GreyBox
description:
Project GreyBox is an extremely basic game created in Unity based in the Synty Polygon Greybox Pack.

It also happens to be my first published game ever.

This game currently has 5 levels, there are no lives, no points to collect, and no enemies, however these features are planned to be added in the near future

ToDo:

  • Sounds
  • Coins or Points
  • Lives
  • Enemies
  • Challenging Levels
  • Trick Levels
  • Resume from last session (aka. Continue)
  • Level Selection
  • Variety of Enemies
  • Variety of Floor Tiles
  • Music Selection
